title: Looks like handwriting, is definitely a font. But which one?
content:
Please help me identify this handwriting-based font.  
Thanks in advance.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [header\_choose-appetizers.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106213809/http:/typophile.com/files/header_choose-appetizers.gif) | 950 bytes |
| [recipes\_header.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106213809/http:/typophile.com/files/recipes_header.jpg) | 15.82 KB |
author: vivicity

comments.content:
Based on a detailed overview I found on the Bowfin Printworks site it appears 'Kirbys Hand' is a rip off from the font 'Page' found in the ClickArt Handwritten Fonts collection by Broderbund.

[http://www.bowfinprintworks.com/ListPages/HWFontAliases.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106213809/http:/www.bowfinprintworks.com/ListPages/HWFontAliases.html "http://www.bowfinprintworks.com/ListPages/HWFontAliases.html")
